channel.title: rant on Yaya's World
channel.description: Recent content in rant on Yaya's World

item.title: On Localizations
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I have 10 max S-Links in Persona 4 Golden \ ( ^ o ^ ) / Just had to say it, lol. That should give you an indication that I have started playing it again. which I have. I'm mostly just working on my S-Links and trying to get through some of the extra post-game content while I wait for things to pick up again. You would think I'd be used to this kind of thing knowing that I also like visual novels, but, for some reason this sort of thing is just not so fun in Persona.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Needing Support is Not Being Lazy
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: This is going to be a bit of a rant. If that is not why you're here and not the type of content you want to see from me, I fully understand. Please feel free to skip this article, even if it is still the only update this week. Before you do that though, I'll let you know a little about what happened and why this is, yet again, the only thing updated this week.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi
